body:
Hi! I started my first time on this server about 16 months ago, but rarely was active. 
Currently, I am quite active. I only play Nexus unless one of the Elimination hubs has lots of people. I would put in my Youtube channel link but it promotes another server. Feel free to ask some questions :)

title: First time on Avicus forums!

replies.body: Welcome to the Avicus Forums! I hope you have fun here!
replies.body_tagged: Welcome to the Avicus Forums! I hope you have fun here!

replies.body: Welcome to the Avicus Network Community, feel free to ask anybody if you need help, and don't hesitate to contact me over skype (vladthegreat100) if you need ANY help :P Even youtube problems or tips, I think I would know what I am doing with 189 subs :)

You might want to read the forum section of the rules so you don't break anything expensive.

We'll be more than happy to help you out!
